extendedInfo.description: Windows 8 Notepad is a notepad inspired by the Metro UI design of Windows 8. It has a clean minimalistic UI. It can create , edit, delete text files. The text color can be chosen to your taste. The font size of the text can be changed by pinch gesture.

reviews.title: Like it.
reviews.comment: It requires access to post to various apps i guess. Works pretty well and looks pretty sweet..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Question! Why the permissions?
reviews.comment: Good app, but something bothers me... Why does a notepad app need the \"retrieve running applications\" permission? Not sure about the phone state & identity one either, though I guess that could be for ads. I see no reason for the first one though!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: retrieve running applications permissions
reviews.comment: Why does this app require access to all running applications? Its just a simple text app. I uninstalled this app. An app that wants access to all running applications that it does not need access to ( I can understand antivirus app needing such permissions, but not a simple txt editor...no way) This app smacks of malicious oportunism, and potential data mining of the device it is installed on. BEWARE!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Top of the class!
reviews.comment: tis app is very good for note taking. It\'s simple, but very effective!
reviews.author: A Google User
